poke_body.name: Pure Body
poke_body.effect: To attach a {L} Energy card from your hand to Raikou, you must discard an Energy card attached to Raikou. (Attach the {L} Energy, and then discard an Energy card from Raikou.)

attacks.name: Lightning Sphere
attacks.effect: You may flip a coin. If heads, discard all {L} Energy cards attached to Raikou. This attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage for each Energy card discarded in this way.
